txt.en:
'I see that you have gained proficiency as an expert jeweller! That is excellent, [placeholder]. You are showing remarkable progress.

'You are about ready to learn to be an artisan jeweller, which is the next step along your path to mastery. To do this, though, you will need to prove your worth to the expert jeweller in Esteldín.

'If you impress Daemirdan, he may allow you to use the superior workbench to create the finest of trinkets from your artisan recipes. Not many have this honour!'

'I see that you have gained proficiency as an expert jeweller! That is excellent, [placeholder]. You are showing remarkable progress.

'You are about ready to learn to be an artisan jeweller, which is the next step along your path to mastery. To do this, though, you will need to prove your worth to the expert jeweller in Esteldín.

'If you impress Daemirdan, he may allow you to use the superior workbench to create the finest of trinkets from your artisan recipes. Not many have this honour!'
Crafting: A Superior Workbench

'If you impress Daemirdan, he may allow you to use the superior workbench to create the finest of trinkets from your artisan recipes. Not many have this honour!'

You have completed Daemirdan's task
'You should speak at once with Daemirdan.'

'I see that you have gained proficiency as an expert jeweller! That is excellent, [placeholder]. You are showing remarkable progress.

'You are about ready to learn to be an artisan jeweller, which is the next step along your path to mastery. To do this, though, you will need to prove your worth to me.

'If you impress me, I may allow you to use the superior workbench to create the finest of trinkets from your artisan recipes. Not many have this honour!'

Daemirdan, a vendor of goods for expert jewellers, can be found in the Craft Hall in Esteldín.\n\nYou should complete Daemirdan's jewellery-making task.
'You should speak at once with Daemirdan.'

'I see that you have gained proficiency as an expert jeweller! That is excellent, [placeholder]. You are showing remarkable progress.

'You are about ready to learn to be an artisan jeweller, which is the next step along your path to mastery. To do this, though, you will need to prove your worth to the expert jeweller in Esteldín.

'If you impress Daemirdan, he may allow you to use the superior workbench to create the finest of trinkets from your artisan recipes. Not many have this honour!'
Daemirdan is in the Esteldín Craft Hall.\n\nYou should tell Daemirdan that you have successfully delivered the three crafted pieces of jewellery to folk throughout Esteldín.
'You should speak at once with Daemirdan.'

'Well done, [placeholder]! You are truly ready to begin your journey as an artisan jeweller and beyond. The superior workbenches can be found here, as well as in many high-level areas throughout Middle-earth. I look forward to hearing of your renown as a great jeweller!'
You have grown swiftly and steadily as a Jeweller and are now nearly ready to begin using more advanced facilities. The superior workbench awaits!
